talk.author: did:plc:m5spyrtxxpmhhzeh3ghqc7vx
talk.utter: I always got pressure too until I clapped back at the main one saying it. She always would say "you need to find someone to love and settle down." My response was to inform her what does she know of love when she was on her seventh marriage and maybe she shouldn't be giving me any advice.

talk.author: did:plc:uocgzzmxictr5nwxgicnpqxc
talk.utter: I was engaged three times before I accepted the 4th proposal. My mom has Alzheimer's and I wanted her to see me married before she forgot me.

talk.author: did:plc:m5spyrtxxpmhhzeh3ghqc7vx
talk.utter: Understandable and commendable üëç I have a messed up past so I decided when I was quite young to stay alone. Sometimes you just know it's for the best.

talk.author: did:plc:m5spyrtxxpmhhzeh3ghqc7vx
talk.utter: Understandable and commendable üëç I have a messed up past so I decided when I was quite young to stay alone. Sometimes you just know it's for the best.

talk.author: did:plc:uocgzzmxictr5nwxgicnpqxc
talk.utter: I really messed up. I wanted to make others happy knowing I wouldn't be and now I can't get out. ü•π It wasn't worth it and if she knew the truth, she would be sad and I would have help.

talk.utter: Likewise, but it makes you stronger, you learn to depend on yourself. It's what allows me to be the hero of my own story and for that I can still be grateful.
